LanguageData.RT_M1075_HEMTT.label: M1075 HEMTT
LanguageData.RT_M1075_HEMTT.description:
an eight-wheel drive, diesel-powered tactical truck with 9 tons of cargo capacities, equipped a 7.62mm self-defence machine gun.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
